org.opendaylight.controller.sal.action

Class PushVlan

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.sal.action.Action
      • org.opendaylight.controller.sal.action.PushVlan
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PushVlan
extends Action
    Insert a 802.1q (outermost) header action Execute it multiple times to achieve QinQ 802.1q = [TPID(16) + TCI(16)] TCI = [PCP(3) + CFI(1) + VID(12)]
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PushVlan(EtherTypes tag)
      Construct a new action instance which represents OF 1.3 PUSH_VLAN.
      PushVlan(EtherTypes tag, int pcp, int cfi, int vlanId) 
      PushVlan(int tag)
      Construct a new action instance which represents OF 1.3 PUSH_VLAN.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj) 
      int getCfi()
      Returns the CFI portion of the 802.1q header this action will insert CFI - (1 bit)
      int getHeader()
      Returns the full 802.1q header this action will insert header = [TPID + TIC] (32 bits)
      int getPcp()
      Returns the vlan PCP portion of the 802.1q header this action will insert PCP - (3 bits)
      int getTag()
      Returns the TPID portion of the 802.1q header this action will insert TPID - (16 bits)

      Returns the TCI portion of the 802.1q header this action will insert TCI = [PCP + CFI + VID] - (16 bits)

      Returns the VID portion of the 802.1q header this action will insert VID - (12 bits)
